definition.name: HoverCard
definition.description: A wrapper component that provides hover card functionality. It acts as the root container for the hover card system, managing the state and context for its children components (trigger and content).

open.description: Controls the open state of the hover card

defaultOpen.description: Sets the initial open state of the hover card

onOpenChange.description: Callback function called when the open state changes

definition.name: HoverCardTrigger
definition.description: The trigger element that will show the hover card content when hovered. This component wraps around the element that should trigger the hover card to appear.

asChild.description: Change the component to the HTML tag or component provided

definition.name: HoverCardContent
definition.description: The content component that appears when the trigger is hovered. It renders a floating card with customizable positioning and animations.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content

align.description: The alignment of the content relative to the trigger

sideOffset.description: The distance in pixels from the trigger

definition.visualLayout: A floating card that appears when the trigger is hovered. It has rounded corners, a border, background color, and smooth animations for entering and exiting. The card includes padding and can be positioned relative to the trigger element.
